name: Mammoth Jump
description:
Mammoth Jump is a simple platformer game where you must save the mammoths from their impending doom by pushing them out of harms way.

Mammoths come in all shapes and sizes, simply click to move them through the level.

Create your own levels using the built in level editor. (Ctrl + S to save your level and Ctrl + O to open a level).

Includes custom soundtrack and effects.
